summary.Title: QC Laboratory Technician
summary.Presentation: Are you passionate about Quality Control and do you like to be challenged by an exciting day? Do you like to work hands on in the middle of the action in a state-of-the-art brand new contract t

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you passionate about Quality Control and do you like to be challenged by an exciting day? Do you like to work hands on in the middle of the action in a state-of-the-art brand new contract testing laboratory? Then you may be the Laboratory Technician we’re looking for at QNTM Labs!

What is QNTM Labs?

QNTM Labs is an EU-GMP certified contract testing laboratory focused on providing analytical research, development, and regulatory compliance applications to pharmaceutical companies.

Headquartered in Odense, Denmark, QNTM Labs operates and is continuously developing a platform of innovative analytical capabilities, while maintaining the highest level of quality to forge new quality and efficiency standards within the pharmaceutical industry.

As global sentiment is increasingly focused on quality data and trusted information, QNTM Labs is determined to improve transparency and access to robust scientific analysis by working hand-in-hand with global pharmaceutical industry stakeholders through analytical testing.

The Position:

Together with your team of technicians and chemists, you will be part of a dedicated Quality Control (QC) team that works with a variety of different analytical methods. You will be responsible for ensuring that laboratory analyses are being performed according to QC procedures and certifying that handling of all pharmaceutical products, such as narcotics, euphoriant substances and standards is performed in compliance with QNTM Labs’ Quality Management System (QMS).

Key Responsibilities & Main Tasks:

  • Assisting in the planning, monitoring and execution of sample analyses
  • Assist in the data processing and analytical reporting
  • Ongoing qualification and maintenance of analytical equipments in the laboratory
  • Preparing and maintaining of varous SOPs
  • Conducting of practical tasks in the QC laboratory, such as waste management, washing, cleaning, etc.
  • Maintaining control and reporting documentation related to narcotic substances, both samples and standards

We need you to:

  • Find daily operations exciting and be intellectually curious with trouble shooting and investigating problems
  • Ensure timely approval of analytical data and make sure to keep our customers satisfied
  • Enjoy working in close cooperation with fellow colleagues while aiming to deliver the highest quality results
  • Thrive working in a GMP environment with high focus on robust operations and details
  • Be committed, structured, and work focused on your tasks

Your background:

  • Educated Lab Technician (Laborant) or bionanalyst.
  • Prior experience working at a Quality Control laboratory within the pharmaceutical industry
  • Strong understanding in analytical techniques for example LC or GC
  • Strong experience and knowledge about GMP and Pharmacopoeias
  • Structured organizational skills and a strong attention to scientific and chemical details
  • Ability to read, write, and speak fluently in English.

    If you have any questions regarding the position, please send an E-mail to our QC Manager Nete at nete.michelsen@qntmlabs.com
